Translations.Text: Kogda My vstupili v zavet s prorokami, s toboy, s Noyem, Avraamom, Moiseyem, Iisusom, synom Marii: togda vstupili My s nimi v zavet tverdyy
Chto by ot vernykh trebovat' vernosti, a nevernym On prigotovil lyutuyu muku

Veruyushchiye! (rech' k uchastnikam bitvy pri rve g. Yasriba) Vspomnite Bozhiye blagodeyaniye vam: kogda shli na vas opolcheniya, My poslali protiv nikh veter i nevidimyye dlya vas opolcheniya. Bog videl vashi dela
Vot, oni napali na vas i sverkhu i snizu, i vot, ochi vashi ponikli, serdtsa dokhodili do gortaney, i vy vpadali v nedoumeniya o Boge
Zdes' veruyushchiye podverglis' iskusheniyu i potryaseny byli sil'nym potryaseniyem
I vot, litsemery i te, kotoryye nemoshchny serdtsami, govoryat: "To, chto obeshchal nam Bog i Yego poslannik, yest' tol'ko obman

I vot, odin otryad iz nikh skazal: "Zhiteli Yasriba! Vam ne mesto zdes'; vozvratites'!" Odin otryad iz nikh prosit u proroka pozvoleniya udalit'sya, govorya: "Domy nashi bezzashchitny". No oni ne byli bezzashchitny sami, oni tol'ko khoteli bezhat'
I yesli by s kotoroy libo iz storon yego sdelalos' nashestviye na nikh i potrebovalos' ispytaniye: oni ne okazali by yego; ostalis' by v nem nemnogiye
togda kak oni prezhde togo uzhe obeshchalis' Bogu, chto nazad ne otstupyat. A v obeshchanii Bogu potrebuyetsya otchet
